14:29 <DarkKnightCZ> is there a way, how to obtain current document in execute method in macro?  
14:50 <DarkKnightCZ> documentAccessBridge.getCurrentDocumentReference()?  
14:57 <NuxRo> guys, has anyone tested xwiki with the new libreoffice 4.3?

17:20 <mbloom> has joined #xwiki  
17:42 <mbloom> do you need to save after $doc.setTitle()?  
17:45 <mbloom> I am moving a page using the $doc.rename() method, but that also replaces the page title with the name. I was thinking about setting a variable to the old title and using setTitle( $var ) after I had executed rename(). Is there a better way to do this?
